1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Dataset as a set of judges.
4--
5--   Dataset is like a bridge of judges and relations.
6--   We can get a relation from a dataset,
7--   that dataset is build from judges.
8
9module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Assert.Dataset
10  ( Dataset,
11    dataset,
12    datasetAdd,
13    datasetSelect,
14  ) where
15
16import qualified Data.Map                     as Map
17import qualified Data.Maybe                   as Maybe
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base         as B
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax       as S
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data         as D
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relkit  as C
22
23
24-- | Dataset is a set of judges.
25data Dataset c = Dataset (Map.Map D.JudgeClass [[S.Term c]])
26
27-- | Dataset that has no judges.
28instance B.Default (Dataset c) where
29    def = Dataset Map.empty
30
31-- | Gather judges into a dataset.
32dataset :: [D.Judge c] -> Dataset c
33dataset js = datasetAdd js B.def
34
35-- | Add judges to dataset.
36datasetAdd :: [D.Judge c] -> Dataset c -> Dataset c
37datasetAdd js ds1 = foldr addJudge ds1 js
38
39-- | Add a judge to dataset.
40addJudge :: D.Judge c -> Dataset c -> Dataset c
41addJudge (D.JudgeAffirm sign xs) (Dataset ds1) = Dataset ds2 where
42    ds2 = Map.insertWith add sign [xs] ds1
43    add new old = new ++ old
44addJudge _ _ = undefined
45
46-- | Select relation from dataset.
47--   If a giving term is not in judges, 'CEmpty' sign is used.
48datasetSelect
49    :: (Ord c, D.CEmpty c)
50    => Dataset c       -- ^ Dataset
51    -> C.RelSelect c   -- ^ Relation selector
52datasetSelect (Dataset m) sign ns = D.Rel h1 b1 where
53    h1 = D.headFrom ns
54    b1 = case Map.lookup sign m of
55      Just args -> B.unique $ map (subarg ns) args
56      Nothing   -> []
57
58subarg :: (D.CEmpty c) => [String] -> [S.Term c] -> [c]
59subarg ns arg = map pick ns where
60    pick n = Maybe.fromMaybe D.empty $ lookup n arg
61
